dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Westerman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to adjust the calculation of average pay for purposes of Federal civilian annuities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Government Employee Pension Reform Act of 2015.
Section 8331(4) of title 5, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking 3 consecutive years and inserting 5 consecutive years; and
by striking 3 years and inserting 5 years.

section.text: Section 8401(3) of title 5, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking 3 consecutive years and inserting 5 consecutive years; and
by striking 3 years and inserting 5 years.

section.text: Section 302(a)(6)(A) of the Federal Employees’ Retirement System Act of 1986 (5 U.S.C. 8331 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking 3 consecutive years and inserting 5 consecutive years; and
by striking 3 years and inserting 5 years.

section.text: The amendments made by this Act shall take effect on January 1, 2017.
